description: Canonical registry of well-known capability identifiers for JSON Agents manifests.

capabilities.description: Summarize one or more input texts.
Route messages to appropriate agents or tools based on content or intent.
Retrieve relevant information or documents from one or more data sources.
Answer user questions using internal or external knowledge sources.
Classify inputs into one or more labels.
Extract structured entities or fields from unstructured content.
Generate new content (text, code, etc.) given instructions.
